title: Lush Courtyard With Hammocks! Plano ISD, 22 ACRE Dog Park!
posting_body: Combining urban chic with lush outdoor spaces, we provide a refreshing and distinctive hideaway in the Metroplex's hottest location.
Gramercy welcomes you home with modern finishes and luxury living inside with exclusive gardens and rich amenities outside.
Lush courtyards and private outdoor spaces with decks, hammocks, grills and pool create the perfect "secret garden" for you and your guests.
Minutes from shopping, dining and entertainment.
located in Dallas, Collin County and Plano ISD.
24 Hour Health and Fitness Center
24 Hour Business Center with Wi-Fi and Starbucks Coffee Machine
Outdoor Kitchen with Stainless Steel Grills
Resort Style Swimming Pool and Cabana Area
Two Lush Courtyards with Grills and Lounge Area
Limited Access Gates
Large Storage Closets
Courtesy Patrol
Outdoor Lounge Area with Fireplace and Television
Private Elevator in Each Building
On Site Fitness Coordinator
BBQ/Picnic Area
Three courtyards with hammocks and grills
Next to 22 acre North Bark Dog Park
Outdoor Lounge with Fireplace and T.V.
Private Storages
